services.heading: Our Services
services.subheading: How can Dionamite help you thrive
services.description: Embark on a journey of digital empowerment with our focused development services. Dionamite specializes in translating your concepts into powerful, user-friendly digital solutions.
services.descriptionBold: Whether you're a marketing agency seeking a dynamic web presence or a tech-forward business aiming for cutting-edge applications,

cards.description1: Our expert team transforms your concepts into powerful, user-friendly applications. Elevate your brand, captivate your audience, and redefine possibilities in the world at the palm of your hands.
cards.description2: Bring your brand to life with our expertise in developing a captivating and ready-to-blow-minds digital presence for your company.
cards.description3: Your e-commerce is your digital stage to spotlight products and connect with your audience. Experience personalized guidance from Dionamite, tailored to the latest best practices and trends.
cards.description4: We develop solutions that seamlessly integrate into your operations, offering efficiency and scalability. From engaging web apps to customized CRMs, we empower your business with innovative, tailored digital solutions.
cards.rui: What Dionamite helped us with was the customization of solution development... I found in Dionamite a vast knowledge that gives me the confidence that we will have an application that precisely meets the needs of our business.
cards.tomoya: The design not only captured the essence of my brand but also ensured a seamless user experience. What sets them apart, especially Diogo, is the personalized approach. They took the time to understand the goals of my business and tailored the website accordingly. This attention to detail and commitment to delivering more than expected is a 10/10!
cards.avi: They quickly understood our needs and expectations, delivering beyond them. The team has a keen eye for design and user experience, and their results reflect that. We're extremely pleased with their work.

team.heading3: We are more than developers â€“ we are your committed partners in achieving complete success.

Step by step, I gathered my squad and birthed an agency on a mission â€“ to be the go-to tech sidekick for agencies and entrepreneurs in need. Because who says tech can't be fun and friendly? We're here to sprinkle some digital magic and make your tech dreams come true! ğŸš€âœ¨

But fear not, because I'm here as the torchbearer for my team, dedicated to building value and representing our hard work. Each day, I lead the charge, asking the crucial question: 'Are we in sync with the client's and the market's expectations?' It's not just a mindset; it's a commitment to honesty in the development journey, a secret sauce that keeps our client relationships flourishing. Because in our book, trust and transparency make the best plot twists!

Magna.cardDescription: CRM Application for Professional Training Management.
Magna.description1: Magna offers a range of comprehensive functionalities, including the creation of courses with various modules, student enrollment in courses, and the registration of trainers in a pool of educators. Trainers registered in this pool become eligible for assignment to specific disciplines.
Magna.description2: A notable feature of Magna is automation in creating and managing all training-related documents, using Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) to handle all Technical-Pedagogical Dossiers (DTP).
Magna.appInfo1: Course coordinators can select the necessary documents for a particular course, and the platform generates these documents automatically based on the data stored in the database. Additionally, the platform allows for the download, signing, and subsequent upload of documents for any future reference.
Magna.appInfo2: Magna generates reports, such as attendance and presence, in Excel format, and enables the insertion and updating of data through Excel documents.
Magna.appInfo3: Furthermore, it offers features for the administration of personal data and identification documents for all involved in the training process.
Magna.appInfo4: The platform enables efficient organization of classes, courses, Short-Duration Training Units (UFCDS), and disciplines.
Magna.appInfo5: Lastly, it stands out for its ability to automatically generate training-related contracts and send them via email to the recipients.
Magna.appInfo6: Magna also stands out for its integration with Moodle, allowing direct retrieval of information from that platform. This integration facilitates access to relevant data, such as student personal information and evaluation data, including attendance, participation, and grades, among others.
Magna.appInfo7: Additionally, Magna integrates with Google Meet, automatically creating rooms and sending links to all class participants. In this way, Magna not only simplifies course management but also establishes an effective bridge with Moodle and Google Meet, maximizing the integration of essential data for efficient and personalized administration of the training process.

MrWipe.heading: is an innovative app for eco-friendly home and on-demand cleaning services
MrWipe.description1: MrWipe is an app for ordering eco-friendly home and on-demand cleaning services, minimizing water usage. It allows easy scheduling on smartphones for quick and efficient cleaning services, standing out with premium offerings tailored for high-quality home or office needs.
MrWipe.description2: Our client, an investor dedicated to this project, chose Dionamite with confidence, expecting timely delivery and post-app launch support. The app, available on Google Play and iOS, caters to users, collaborators, and administrators, each with their dedicated dashboard.
MrWipe.appInfo1: Developed with Node, React Native, MongoDB, and Firebase, the app prioritizes user and application owner (MRWIPE UNIPESSOAL LDA) rights protection.
MrWipe.appInfo2: Specific features include multi-language support (English, Portuguese, or Russian),
MrWipe.appInfo3: , an admin interface for quick assessment of cleaning collaborator candidates, MBWAY and Stripe payment integration, TOC online invoicing, and automated email sending.
MrWipe.appInfo4: The app also incorporates geolocation services,
MrWipe.appInfo5: offering real-time tracking of cleaning collaborators, user-scheduled appointments based on collaborator availability, instant event notifications,
MrWipe.appInfo6: and the use of Maps API and GeoLocation API for route integration between users and collaborators.
MrWipe.appInfo8: or search for "MrWipe" in the App Store for iOS.
